title: Exploring the evolution of OG&E’s grid to best meet increasing demand of the past and in the future with Ryan Jones
description: At the 2025 OATI Energy Conference, Ryan Jones, Grid Innovation Manager at OG&E sat down with John Engel from OATI to talk about the transformation that OG&E is going through on every level, highlighting the positive impact these developments have made on Oklahoma region's customers and economy.
